entry.title: SNOWFALL WARNING ENDED, La Vérendrye (Réserve faunique)
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 3:45 p.m. EDT Saturday 1 April 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Light snow. Low minus 18.
entry.summary: Light snow ending this evening then clearing. Local blowing snow this evening. Wind becoming northwest 30 km/h gusting to 60 this evening then light before morning. Low minus 18. Wind chill minus 7 this evening and minus 26 overnight. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EDT Saturday 1 April 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Mainly sunny. High zero.
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Wind up to 15 km/h. High zero. Wind chill minus 27 in the morning. UV index 5 or moderate. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EDT Saturday 1 April 2023
